Articles.Content:
Hello everyone.

So i an fairly new here but have been playing KSP for about 2 years now. Anyway just thought i would share a few pics of what i did for the Kerbin Cup. Will get some screens of the ships that got the soccer nets to Mun and all the players. Not a difficult task but was a fun little rip. Thinking about building a stadium but i am Canadian if i did that it would be an ice hockey rink. Cheers

Welcome to the forums!

That's certainly a creative little setup there. I'll be looking forward to seeing how you got those to the Mun.

Nice football game!

Glad to see you on the forums after all this time. Hope you enjoy your stay.
